mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select apply.applydate,apply.normal_name,TRUNC((sysdate-apply.normal_birth)/365) notice_idx,normalmember.gender,member.addr,apply."CHECK",apply.member_idx from apply,normalmember,member where normalmember.member_idx=member.idx and apply.notice_idx=#{idx};) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
